name: Software Engineer
description:
For more than 15 years, IPONWEB has been creating innovative projects that allow expanding opportunities in the field of media trading. We are world leaders among companies that create AdTech technologies and infrastructure.

We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer who is ready to play a key role in the development and support of corporate web services. Our systems are built in modern Python and Java platforms. Our team works on Identity and Access Management, Permission Management, and Data Integration. We support some mission critical services so we pay a lot of attention to testing, code review and internal architecture.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Development of corporate web services;
  • Support internal users (other developers and stakeholders) regarding our services;
  • Propose technical and business logic improvements;
  • Actively participate in knowledge sharing.


Role Requirements:

  • 2+ years of software development experience;
  • Proven Java development experience, good knowledge of language and frameworks;
  • Experience in backend web development and APIs;
  • Knowledge of client side web technologies (HTML/CSS/JS) and frameworks (JQuery, Bootstrap, etc.);
  • Wide experience with Linux systems;
  • Good knowledge of network protocols;
  • Good knowledge of relational databases;
  • Good knowledge of source code management systems and CI/CD tools;
  • Solid and clear code style;
  • Experience of work according to TDD approach;
  • Short and long term planning of development tasks taking into account further code changes/re-engineering;
  • Ability to follow the standards of development and workflow: code review, testing and documentation;
  • Good written English.

We offer:

  • Career opportunity within High Tech international company - one of the leaders in the Programmatic Marketing industry;
  • Open and approachable management team with strong engineering DNA (80% of Moscow office - engineers, managers and executives with technical background);
  • Internal pathways for career development and professional growth, supported by Performance Management System;
  • Competitive compensation package;
  • Corporate Health Insurance Program or Voluntary Insurance Program (VMI);
  • Internal and external learning courses both for professional and soft skills development;
  • English Corporate Program;
  • Relocation Program for you and your family from any region of Russia to Moscow office;
  • Full flexibility outside our core working hours 12:00-18:00;
  • Referral Bonus Program;
  • Recognition of employee milestones.

IPONWEB provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, IPONWEB complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.
